resources.string:
■ 1 glass milk with 2 teaspoons of,
 skimmed milk powder, 2 whole 
 ripe bananas, and 5 to 10 pieces 
 of overnight soaked almonds
 with peel.

■ 1 cup of tea or cappuccino
 loaded with sugar and full-fat
 milk, white portions of 2 eggs,
 and 6 to 7 pieces of overnight
 soaked almonds with peel.
■ 6 slices of omelet toasted bread (use 2 eggs for this).
■ 2 plain chapattis and 1 small bowl\n of vegetables.
■ 2 masala dosa, 2 cups of sambar,\n and 1 spoon of chutney.\n
■ 1 glass of fresh juice and 1 plate\n of salad with 2 boiled potatoes.

■ 1 fresh whole seasonal fruit 
 (of your choice) and 1 glass of 
 buttermilk/plain lassi/coconut 
 water.

■ 1 cup of green tea, 2 to 3
 multi-grain biscuits, and 1 fresh
 fruit (apple or orange).

■ 2 small bowls of plain rice, 2 
 medium-sized chapattis with 
 ghee, 1 small bowl of legumes/ 
 dal(mung, chana, masoor, or 
 soybean), 2 small bowls of wet 
 vegetable curry (as per your 
 choice), 2 medium-sized pieces of 
 chicken/fish, 1 plate of green 
 salad and 1 small bowl of sweet 
 curd/raita

■ 1 small bowl of pulav/biriyani 
 (non-veg), 1 small bowl of egg/ 
 paneer, 1 small bowl of 
 vegetables (as per your choice), 
 and 1 medium-sized bowl of 
 chicken soup/sprout salad.
■ 1 fresh seasonal fruit and a few nuts.\n

■ medium-sized chapattis
 ghee, 1 small bowl of 
 legumes/dal (moong, chana, 
 masoor, or soybean), 1 
 small bowl of dry 
 vegetable curry(as per 
 your choice), 1 small 
 bowl of chicken/fish,and 
 1 small bowl of curd/ 
 any other sweet dish

■ 1 small bowl of brown rice/2
 whole wheat chapattis, 1 small
 bowl of stir-fried vegetables
 with baked potato, and 1 small
 piece of lean chicken/fish.

■ 1 glass full of warm milk with 1
 teaspoon of raw honey and a
 pinch of turmeric added to it.
■ 1 cup of skimmed milk with nuts.\n
■ 1 fruit of your choice + 3-4 mixed\n seeds such as watermelon, flax,\n sesame, melon to name a few.
■ 10 Spirulina or green leafy veggie\n juice + 1 fruit of your choice.\n
■2 egg omelet with 2 whole--*grain\n bread slices.
■1 bowl vegetable sprout poha with\n chutney.\n
■ 1 bowl cut fresh fruits of choice.

■2 multigrain roti + 1 bowl veg or
 non-veg (seafood, fish, chicken)
 subji of choice + 1 bowl of thick
 dal.
■ 1 fruit of your choice + 1\n cup green tea.
■ 1 cup spiced boiled corn +\n 1 cup coffee, tea or green tea

■ Til or peanut chikki with 1
 cup spirulina and mixed veggie
 juice.

■ vegetable pulao + 1 bowl
 vegetable raita + 1 bowl
 vegetable or chicken salad
 of choice.

■ 1 bowl vegetable and mixed
 seeds salad + 2 multigrain roti
 + 1 non-veg subji or dal of
 your choice.
